post:
I understand that this offer might not be as low as some people on here are used to, but it's definitely the lowest VPS prices I've ever offered. But on the flip side, we are definitely not a fly-by-night host. I've been offering VPS plans for years now and even had a LET offer posted back in 2009: http://www.lowendbox.com/blog/zensix-6-99-128mb-openvz-vps

It's limited stock, as I just need to fill up a few older public nodes. There are three plans, but I'll just post the lowest priced one here:

**Budget-VZ1**
Guaranteed RAM - 128 MB
Burst RAM - 192 MB
Disk Space	 - 10 GB
Bandwidth	- 200 GB
IP Addresses - One
CPU Cores - One
100Mbit Shared Port
Price: $29.95/year

More details: http://zensix.com

You should also be aware that these specific plans will be on nodes without hardware RAID and do not include TUN/TAP or ipv6. If there is a real interest in these low priced plans, I'll get some more nodes set up and not be so restrictive.

Servers are in Kansas City at both Wholesale Internet and Datashack (hence the no hardware RAID). Most likely you will all go on NODE6, which is at Datashack. Uptime reports and server statuses can be found here: http://status.zensix.com

Setup is done manually and can take up to 24 hours.
